question: Iré al parque el Lunes
answer: I will go to the park on Monday

question: Me reuniré con él a la noche
answer: I will meet him at night

question: Esa ley no se ha modificado desde 1980
answer: That law hasn't been modified since 1980

question: He estado trabajando allí durante 2 años
answer: I have been working there for 2 years

question: Trabajamos de Lunes a Viernes
answer: We work from Monday to Friday

question: Él está de vacaciones hasta el Viernes
answer: He is on holiday until Friday

question: Estará de vuelta para las seis
answer: He will be back by six o'clock
